languages.text: {n}Вигдис бросает на Соломона холодный взгляд, прежде чем продолжить.{/n} "Я изучила архивы и нашла упоминание ритуала "установления контакта", который включает в себя подношение и физическое взаимодействие с бестией..."

traits.locale_text: {n}Вигдис бросает на Соломона убийственный взгляд.{/n} "Кто-то упомянул ритуал "установления контакта" с бестиями, который включает в себя подношение и физический контакт".

languages.text: {n}Vigdis casts Solomorne a cold glance before continuing.{/n} "I had studied the archives and found mention of a ritual to establish contact that involves an offering and physical interaction with the beast—"
languages.original_text: {n}Вигдис бросает на Соломона холодный взгляд, прежде чем продолжить.{/n} "Я изучила архивы и нашла упоминание ритуала "установления контакта", который включает в себя подношение и физическое взаимодействие с бестией..."

traits.locale_text: {n}Vigdis casts Solomorne a cold glance before continuing.{/n} "I had studied the archives and found mention of a ritual to establish contact that involves an offering and physical interaction with the beast—"

{n}Vigdis casts Solomorne a cold glance before continuing.{/n} "I had studied the archives and found mention of a ritual to establish contact that involves an offering and physical interaction with the beast—"

languages.text: {n}ヴィグディスはソロモーンに冷ややかな視線を投げてから、話を続けた。{/n}「私は資料を調べて、あの獣と接触を確立するための、供物と、身体的な接触を伴う儀式についての記述を見つけました」
languages.original_text: {n}Vigdis casts Solomorne a cold glance before continuing.{/n} "I had studied the archives and found mention of a ritual to establish contact that involves an offering and physical interaction with the beast—"

traits.locale_text: {n}ヴィグディスはソロモーンに冷ややかな視線を投げてから、話を続けた。{/n}「私は資料を調べて、あの獣と接触を確立するための、供物と、身体的な接触を伴う儀式についての記述を見つけました」

languages.text: {n}Vigdis, Solomorne'a soğuk bir bakış atıp sözlerine devam ediyor.{/n} "Arşivleri incelediğimde iletişim kurmak için bir adak sunmayı ve bir hayvanla fiziksel etkileşime geçmeyi içeren bir ayinden bahsedildiğini görmüştüm."
languages.original_text: {n}Vigdis casts Solomorne a cold glance before continuing.{/n} "I had studied the archives and found mention of a ritual to establish contact that involves an offering and physical interaction with the beast—"

traits.locale_text: {n}Vigdis, devam etmeden öncce Solomorne'a soğuk bir bakış atar.{/n} "Arşivleri incelemiştim ve orada, iletişim kurmak için bir adak sunmayı ve bir canavarla fiziksel etkileşime girmeyi içeren bir ritüelden bahsedildiğini görmüştüm."

languages.text: {n}Vigdis lanza una mirada gélida a Solomorne antes de continuar.{/n} «Había estudiado los archivos y encontrado menciones de un ritual que implica una ofrenda e interacción física con la bestia...».
languages.original_text: {n}Vigdis casts Solomorne a cold glance before continuing.{/n} "I had studied the archives and found mention of a ritual to establish contact that involves an offering and physical interaction with the beast—"

traits.locale_text: {n}Vigdis lanza una mirada gélida a Solomorne antes de continuar.{/n} «Había estudiado los archivos y encontrado menciones de un ritual que implica una ofrenda e interacción física con la bestia...».

languages.text: {n}维格迪斯冷冷地看了索罗蒙一眼，随后继续开了口。{/n}“我研究过飞船上的档案，上面记载了某种与牲畜建立联结的仪式。仪式步骤包括：献上祭品，与目标牲畜进行物理接触——”
languages.original_text: {n}Vigdis casts Solomorne a cold glance before continuing.{/n} "I had studied the archives and found mention of a ritual to establish contact that involves an offering and physical interaction with the beast—"

traits.locale_text: {n}维格迪斯冷冷地看了索罗蒙一眼，随后继续开了口。{/n}“我研究过飞船上的档案，上面记载了某种与牲畜建立联结的仪式。仪式步骤包括：献上祭品，与目标牲畜进行物理接触——”

languages.text: {n}Vigdis foudroie Solomorne du regard avant de reprendre.{/n} « J'ai étudié des archives mentionnant un rituel servant à établir un contact. Elles conseillaient d'effectuer une offrande et de proposer une interaction physique avec la bête... »
languages.original_text: {n}Vigdis casts Solomorne a cold glance before continuing.{/n} "I had studied the archives and found mention of a ritual to establish contact that involves an offering and physical interaction with the beast—"

traits.locale_text: {n}Vigdis foudroie Solomorne du regard avant de reprendre.{/n} « J'ai étudié des archives mentionnant un rituel servant à établir un contact. Elles conseillaient d'effectuer une offrande et de proposer une interaction physique avec la bête... »

languages.text: {n}Vigdis wirft Solomorne einen kalten Blick zu, ehe sie fortfährt.{/n} "Ich war beim Studium der Archive auf ein Ritual zur Kontaktaufnahme gestoßen, das eine Opfergabe und körperliche Interaktion mit der Bestie umfasst ..."
languages.original_text: {n}Vigdis casts Solomorne a cold glance before continuing.{/n} "I had studied the archives and found mention of a ritual to establish contact that involves an offering and physical interaction with the beast—"

traits.locale_text: {n}Vigdis wirft Solomorne einen kalten Blick zu, ehe sie fortfährt.{/n} "Ich war beim Studium der Archive auf ein Ritual zur Kontaktaufnahme gestoßen, das eine Opfergabe und körperliche Interaktion mit der Bestie umfasst ..."
